solution_line_template: On Wednesday, Carlo practiced for {thursday_practice_minutes} + {wednesday_more_than_thursday} = <<{thursday_practice_minutes}+{wednesday_more_than_thursday}={wednesday_practice_minutes}>>{wednesday_practice_minutes} minutes.

On Tuesday, he practiced for {wednesday_practice_minutes} - {tuesday_less_than_wednesday} = <<{wednesday_practice_minutes}-{tuesday_less_than_wednesday}={tuesday_practice_minutes}>>{tuesday_practice_minutes} minutes.
On Monday, he practiced for {tuesday_practice_minutes} x {monday_multiplier} = <<{tuesday_practice_minutes}*{monday_multiplier}={monday_practice_minutes}>>{monday_practice_minutes} minutes.

So, Carlo practiced for a total of {monday_practice_minutes} + {tuesday_practice_minutes} + {wednesday_practice_minutes} + {thursday_practice_minutes} = <<{monday_practice_minutes}+{tuesday_practice_minutes}+{wednesday_practice_minutes}+{thursday_practice_minutes}={total_practice_mon_thu}>>{total_practice_mon_thu} minutes from Monday to Thursday.
He needs to practice for a total of {minutes_per_hour} x {total_hours_needed} = <<{minutes_per_hour}*{total_hours_needed}={total_minutes_needed}>>{total_minutes_needed} minutes.

Therefore, he should practice for {total_minutes_needed} - {total_practice_mon_thu} = <<{total_minutes_needed}-{total_practice_mon_thu}={friday_practice_minutes}>>{friday_practice_minutes} minutes on Friday.
